contents.name: AutoTileGen
contents.description: AutoTileGen is an automatic tileset generator for 2D game terrains.

contents.name: LDtk
contents.description: LDtk is an open-source 2D level editor for indie devs, with a strong focus on user-friendliness.

contents.name: MapperMate
contents.description: A cloud based tile map editor used to create 2D levels directly in the browser.

contents.name: Material Maker
contents.description: procedural texture creator made in Godot

contents.name: Overlap2D
contents.description: a 2D level and UI editor with an engine agnostic philosophy.

contents.name: Sprite Fusion
contents.description: A free level design tool to craft beautiful 2D tilemaps right in your browser using any tileset.

contents.name: Tiled
contents.description: free, easy to use and flexible tile map editor.
